SquareGridFactory.GridHideSmallerThan: Hide grid lines when they are closer than this many pixels together
SquareGridFactory.GridHideFactor: Factor to skip by when hiding close grid lines
SquareGridFactory.GridSecondaryHighlight: Highlight grid lines every X units (0 disables)
SquareGridFactory.GridPrimaryHighlight: Highlight every Xth grid line (0 disables)

LayoutSettings.Title: Layout settings

Each rectangle represents a viewport.
Click and drag rectangles to combine viewports.
Click a combined viewport to un-combine it.
